I've configured one mail-address on my server to use across different services. It would be nice to have an option to enter a sender's name to the mail notifications (e.g. 'My Uptime Kuma') to distinguish these mails from other mails from this server. 

See example:
currently =` From: <my.cloud@yahoo.com>`
desired = `From: **My Uptime Kuma** <my.cloud@yahoo.com>`

The text in bold is a field that can be entered in the mail notification settings (e.g. `From`)

This PR will affect the performance of our `uptime-kuma` instance. We currently run the service with 2vCPU/2GB RAM, and we monitor close to 300 services/sites/servers.

A note on the performance/implementation: it _might_ be possible to use a sliding summation/data collection for the graphs.
